mapper.insert: INSERT INTO elder_regular_check (elder_regular_check_code, center_code, center_name, elder_id, elder_name, employee_id, employee_name, elder_regular_check_category, elder_regular_check_plan_date, elder_regular_check_doing_date, elder_regular_check_registration_date) VALUES (#{elderRegularCheckCode}, #{centerCode}, #{centerName}, #{elderId}, #{elderName}, #{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{elderRegularCheckCategory}, #{elderRegularCheckPlanDate}, #{elderRegularCheckDoingDate}, #{elderRegularCheckRegistrationDate})
mapper.select: SELECT elder_regular_check_code, center_code, center_name, elder_id, elder_name, employee_id, employee_name, elder_regular_check_category, elder_regular_check_registration_date, MAX(elder_regular_check_doing_date) as elder_regular_check_doing_date, MAX(elder_regular_check_plan_date) as elder_regular_check_plan_date FROM elder_regular_check WHERE elder_id = #{elderId} GROUP BY elder_regular_check_category
